explains: n. 臀部，髋；屋脊；野蔷薇果
【名】 （Hip）（塞）希普，（中）协（广东话·威妥玛）（人名）
wordGroup: shoot from the hip 鲁莽地做事
hip hop n. 嘻哈文化（由快板歌、涂墙艺术、霹雳舞等构成的亚文化）
hip bone 髋骨，坐骨；无名骨

sentences.en: He fell and fractured his hip.
sentences.cn: 他跌了一跤将髋关节摔裂。

sentences.en: She broke her hip in the fall.
The car struck him a glancing blow on the hip.
